Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.IAeLockManager.IAeLock

Packages that use IAeLockManager.IAeLock
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery This package contains classes for recovering or regenerating the state of a process from alarms, messages, or faults that the process received.

static class AeAbstractLockManager.AeLock
          This class implements a simple lock object which contains both a QName and correlation hash.

          Allows for subclass to obtain lock in its own way.
protected  boolean AeAbstractLockManager.threadOwnsLock(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Returns true if the calling Thread already owns this lock and increments the reference counter for the lock if already owned.
protected  void AeAbstractLockManager.bindLock(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Binds the lock to the current thread.
protected  void AeAbstractLockManager.incrementReferenceCount(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Increments the reference count for this lock.
protected  boolean AeAbstractLockManager.decrementReferenceCount(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Decrements the reference count for this lock and returns true if the lock is no longer being referenced.
protected  boolean AeAbstractLockManager.unbindLock(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Unbinds the lock from the current thread.
